# Canada
colonial_canada = {
	color = { 20 50 210 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 1
	native_size = 4
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 4
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 20
		fish = 10
		naval_supplies = 3
		grain = 1
	}

	culture = {
		inuit = 10
		cree = 10
		nakota = 2
		cheyenne = 2
		anishinabe = 2
		huron = 2
		iroquois = 2
		mahican = 2
		abenaki = 2
		mikmaq = 2
	}
	
	religion = {
		shamanism = 10
	}
	
	provinces = {
1010 1008 1009 1011 1006 1005 1004 1007 1002 1003 1000 999 998 1001 992 991 989 988 987
993 990 994 986 985 984 995 996 997 981 980 983 982 1104 1105 1804 1805 1806 1807 1811 1812 2595
2005 2601 2004 1813 2018 2012 2015 2017 
2568 2569 2570 2571 2572 2582 2583 2584 2580 2579 2577 2576 2578 2573 2575 2574 2670 2586 2587 2585 4146 4178 4179
2671 2581 2588 2589 2590 2591 2592 2593 2594 2596 2598 2597 2599 2600 2602 2603 4667 4671 4672 4673 4674 4675 4676 4677 4678 4679 4680 4681 4682 4683 4684 4685 4686 4687 4688 4689 4690 4691 4692 4693 4694 4695 4696 4697 4698 4699 4700 4701 4702 4703 4704 4705 4706 4707 4708 4709 4710 4711 4712 4713 4714 4715 4716 4717 4718 4719 4720 4721 4722 4723 4724 4725 4726 4727 4728 4729 4730 4731 4732 4733 4734 4735 4736 4737 4738 4739 4740 4741 4742 4743 4744 4745 4746 4747 4748 4749 4750 4751 4752 4753 4754 4755 4756 4757 4758 4759 4760 4761 4762 4763 4764 4765 4766 4767 4768 4769 4770 4771 4772 4773 4774 4775 4776 4777 4778 4779 4780 4781 4782 4783 4784 4785 4786 4787 4788 4789 4790 4791 4792 4793 4794 4795 4796 4797 4798 4799 4800 4801 4802 4803 4804 4805 4806 4807 4808 4809 9549 9550 9551 9552
	}
	
	# Specific
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				culture_group = french
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Root_Culture_GetGroupName_Canada"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				culture_group = french
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Acadia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = FRA
			OR = {
				any_owned_province = {
					OR = {
						area = highlands_area
						area = lowlands_area
					}
				}
				overlord_of = SCO
				alliance_with = SCO
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nouvelle_Écosse"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = BRU
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_REGION_New_Root_GetName"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Newfoundland"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Root_Culture_GetName_Quebec"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Laurentia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Borealia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
				tag = SCO
			}
			OR = {
				tag = SCO
				SCO = { exists = no }
			}
			any_owned_province = {
				OR = {
					area = highlands_area
					area = lowlands_area
				}
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nova_Scotia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = POR
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Lavrador"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = SCO
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nova_Scotia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = SCO
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nouvelle_Ecosse"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = IRO
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Kanata"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			culture_group = scandinavian
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Vinland"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = NED
				tag = HOL
				primary_culture = dutch
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nova_Hollandia"
	}
	# Generic
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Root_Culture_GetName_Canada"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_REGION_New_Root_GetName"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Root_Culture_GetName_Quebec"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Newfoundland"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Labrador"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nova_Scotia"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Acadia"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Laurentia"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Borealia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			owns = 1010 # Manitoba
		}
		name = "PROV1010"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Hudson_Bay"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Ruperts_Land"
	}
}

# Eastern America
colonial_eastern_america = {
	color = { 69 157 208 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 2
	native_size = 8
	native_ferocity = 2
	native_hostileness = 5
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 15
		fish = 3
		naval_supplies = 4
		grain = 4
		tobacco = 8
		cotton = 10
		sugar = 1
	}
	
	culture = {
		creek = 5
		choctaw = 2
		chickasaw = 2
		cherokee = 5
		shawnee = 5
		dakota = 2
		iroquois = 3
		powhatan = 2
		delaware = 4
		susquehannock = 5
		mahican = 2
		pequot = 2
		abenaki = 4
	}
	
	religion = {
		shamanism = 10
	}
	
	provinces = {
481 918 929 931 932 933 935 936 937 938 949 950 951 952 953 954 955 956 957 958 962 963 965

# Louisiana
colonial_louisiana = {
	color = { 33 87 161 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 1
	native_size = 18
	native_ferocity = 2
	native_hostileness = 6
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 10
		fish = 1
		grain = 11
		cotton = 7
		iron = 1
	}
	
	culture = {
		nakota = 2
		dakota = 8
		chiwere = 3
		pawnee = 10
		osage = 3
		caddo = 6
		cheyenne = 1
		shoshone = 1
	}
	
	religion = {
		shamanism = 20
		animism = 20
	}
	
	provinces = {
890 891 892 893 894 895 897 899 900 915 916 919 920 921 942 943 896 917 909 898 901 903
907 908 905 904 902 944 945 910 911 912 913 914 1809 2016 2511 906 2608
2006 2007 2008 2009 2014
2509 2672 2507 2508 2512 2517 2518 2513 2519 2520 2514 2515 2516 2530 2529 2528 2523 2524 2522 2521 2501 2502 2503 2504 2505 2510 2625 6316 6317 6318 6319 6320 6321 6322 6323 6324 6325 6326 6327 6328 6329 6330 6331 6332
                6333 6334 6335 6336 6337 6338 6339 6340 6341 6342 6343 6344 6345 6346 6347 6348 6349 6350 6351 6352 6353 6354 6355 6356 6357 6358 6359 6360 6361 6362 6363 6364 6365 6366 6367 6368 6369 6370 6371 6372 6373 6374 6375 6376 6377 6378 6379 6380 6381 6382 6383 6384 6385 6386 6387 6388 6389 6390 6391 6392 6393 6394 6395 6396 6397 6398 6399 6400 6401 6402 6403 6404 6405 6406 6407 6408 6409 6410 6411 6412 6413 6414 6415 6416 6417 6418 6419 6420 6421 6422 6423 6424 6425 6426 6427 6428 6429 6430 6431 6432 6433 6434 6435 6436 6437 6438 6439 6440 6441 6442 6443 6444 6445 6446 6447 6448 6449 6450 6451 6452 6453 6454 6455 6456 6457 6458 6459 6460 6461 6462 6463 6464 6465 6466 6467 6468 6469 6470 6471 6472 6473 6474 6475 6476 6477 6478 6479 6480 6481 6482 6483 6484 6485 6486 6487 6488 6489 6490 6491 6492 6493 6494 6495 6496 6497 6498 6499 6500 6501 6502 6503 6504 6505 6506 6507 6508 6509 6510 6511 6512

	}

			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				culture_group = french

	# Generic

	}

# California
colonial_california = {
	color = { 200 117 43 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 1
	native_size = 8
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 3
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 4
		grain = 3
		salt = 1
		fish = 1
		wool = 2
	}
	
	culture = {
		shoshone = 10
		piman = 8
		navajo = 1
	}
	
	religion = {
		shamanism = 4
		animism = 10

	provinces = {

# Mexico
colonial_mexico = {
	color = { 231 181 12 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 3
	native_size = 8
	native_ferocity = 2
	native_hostileness = 5
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 2
		grain = 8
		salt = 5
		wool = 7
		fish = 5
		sugar = 8
		gold = 5
		cocoa = 6
		naval_supplies = 1
	}
	
	culture = {
		pueblo = 2
		navajo = 10
		piman = 5
		aztek = 8
		zapotek = 6
		yucatec = 3
		putun = 3
		highland_mayan = 3
	}
	
	religion = {
		animism = 10
	}
	
	provinces = {

		trigger = {
			any_owned_province = {

				}
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_MEXICO_Yucatan"

# The Carribean
colonial_the_carribean = {
	color = { 78 202 78 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 4
	native_size = 12
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 3
	
	trade_goods = {
		sugar = 18
		cocoa = 1
		cotton = 2
	}
	
	culture = {
		arawak = 15
		carib = 8
	}
	
	religion = {
		animism = 10
	}
	
	provinces = {
482 483 484 485 486 487 488 489 490 491 492 493 494 495 496 497 498 499 500 501 502 1881 3057
2658 2659 2654 2655 2656 4618 4619 4620 4621 4622 4623 4624 10698 10699 10700 10701 10702 10703 10704 10705 10736 10737 10738 10739 10740 10741 10742 10743 10744 10745 10746 10747 10748 10749 10750 10751 10752 10753 10754 10755 10756 10757 10758 10759 10760 10761 10762 10763 10764 10765 10766 10767 10768 10769 10770 10771 10772 10773 10774 10797 10798 10799 10800 10801 10802 10803 10804 10805 10806 10807 10808 10809 10810 10811 10812 10813 10814 10815  10816 10817 10818 10819 10820 10821 10822 10823 10824 10825 10826 10827 10828 10829 10898 10899 10900 10901 10902 10903 10904 10905 10906 10907 10908 10909 10910 10911 10912 10913 10914 10915 10916 10917 10918 10995 10996 10997 10998 10999 11000 11001 11002 11003 11004 11005 11006 11007 11008 11009 11010 
	}
	
	# Specific
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = SPA
				tag = CAS
				tag = ARA
			}
			owns = 488 # Les Cayes
			owns = 489 # Barahonas
			owns = 490 # Tortuga
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_THE_CARRIBEAN_Hispaniola"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = SPA
				tag = CAS
				tag = ARA
			}
			owns = 484 # Havana
			owns = 485 # Moron
			owns = 486 # Guantanamo
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_THE_CARRIBEAN_Isla_Juana"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				culture_group = french
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_THE_CARRIBEAN_Antilles"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			owns = 484 # Havana
			owns = 485 # Moron
			owns = 486 # Guantanamo
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_THE_CARRIBEAN_Cuba"
	}

			tag = POR

	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = POR
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_THE_CARRIBEAN_Antilhas"
	}
	# Generic

		name = "COLONIAL_THE_CARRIBEAN_Root_Culture_GetName_West_Indies"
	}

		name = "COLONIAL_THE_CARRIBEAN_West_Indies"

# La Plata
colonial_la_plata = {
	color = { 101 102 163 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 3
	native_size = 12
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 4
	
	trade_goods = {
		grain = 15
		fish = 5
		gold = 2
		copper = 2
	}

	culture = {
		aimara = 6
		patagonian = 10
		chacoan = 2
		guarani = 4
	}
	religion = {
		animism = 10
	}
	
	provinces = {

	}
	
	# Specific
	names = {
		trigger = {
			culture_group = british
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Argentine"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = POR
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Rio_de_Prata"
	}

		trigger = {
			tag = POR
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Transplatina"
	}
	# Generic
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Root_Culture_GetName_La_Plata"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_REGION_New_Root_GetName"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			any_owned_province = { 
				area = paraguay_area
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Root_Culture_GetName_Paraguay"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = { # Amélioration la Pléiade
			any_owned_province = { 
				OR = {
					area = southern_chile_area
					area = central_chile_area
					area = northern_chile_area 
				}
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Root_Culture_GetName_Chile"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Argentina"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			owns = 772 # Uruguay
		}
		name = "PROV772"
	}
}

# Brazil
colonial_brazil = {
	color = { 57 160 101 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 2
	native_size = 8
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 4
	
	trade_goods = {
		sugar = 13
		grain = 4
		fish = 1
		gold = 4
		tobacco = 3
	}
	
	culture = {
		guarani = 5
		tupinamba = 12
	}
	
	religion = {
		animism = 10
	}
	
	provinces = {

	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = POR
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_BRAZIL_Root_Culture_GetName_Brazil"
	}

		trigger = {
			tag = POR
			religion_group = christian
		}

			OR = {
				tag = MOR

			}
			religion_group = muslim

		name = "COLONIAL_BRAZIL_new_granada"

			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				culture_group = french
			}

				owns = 743

			}
